Detailed Description

NAME

WeBWorK::Form - extract form input from an Apache::Request and provide an interface to it.

sub new {
    #print "new called with \@_ = ( " . (join ", ", @_)  . " )\n";
    my ($invocant, $r) = @_;
    my $class = ref($invocant) || $invocant;
    my $self = {};

    return bless $self, $class;
}
public method WeBWorK::Form::new_from_paramable ( $$   ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in new_from_paramable($$): 13
sub new_from_paramable ($$) {
    my ($invocant, $r) = @_;
    my $class = ref($invocant) || $invocant;
    my $self = {};

    # list of param names
    my @params = $r->param;
    foreach my $key (@params) {
        $self->{$key} = [ $r->param($key) ];
    }

    return bless $self, $class;
}

sub new_test {

    my $self = {
        a => [qw(aa ab ac)],
        b => [ "bcontents" ],
        c => [ "cc", "ccd" ],
        d => [ "what d has" ],
    };

    return bless $self, $class;
}
public method WeBWorK::Form::param (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in param: 24
sub param {
    my ($self, $param, @values) = @_;
    
    # Called with one argument.  Return keys.
    if (!defined $param) {
        return keys %$self;
    }
    
    # called with three arguments.  Set a value, then fall through
    if (scalar(@values)) {
        if (ref $values[0]) {
            $self->{$param} = $values[0];
        } else {
            $self->{$param} = [ @values ];
        }
    }
    
    # Called with 2+ arguments.  Return requested value
    if (wantarray) {
        return @{$self->{$param}};
    } else {
        return $self->{$param}[0];
    }
}
public method WeBWorK::Form::printable (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in printable: 13
sub printable {
    my $self = shift;
    my $printedform = "";
    foreach my $key ($self->param) {
        $printedform .= "[$key]\n";
        foreach my $value ($self->param($key)) {
            $printedform .= "$value\n";
        }
        $printedform .= "\n";
    }
    
    return $printedform;
}
public method WeBWorK::Form::Vars (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in Vars: 9
sub Vars {
    my $self = shift;
    my %varsFormat = ();
    foreach my $key ($self->param) {
        $varsFormat{$key} = join "\0", $self->param($key);
    }
    
    return %varsFormat; 
}
